title: IFace2.IGetTrimCurveTopologyTypes
description: Gets the trim curve topology type array for this face.
returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of longs indicating the topology types as defined in swSelectType_e VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Use
IFace2::GetTrimCurveTopology
or
IFace2::IGetTrimCurveTopology
to get the trim curve topology for this face.
